text: Just don’t add the layout.css. It will still put in the span* style classes but they won’t do anything unless there’s css for it.

i) cannot be done at this point
ii) use the layout.css file found in the HubSpot boilerplate and set up your drag and drop partial with columns with the following, where the width is the number of grid columns and set the offset based on where that grid column should start
{% dnd_column
  offset=0,
  width=12
%}
iii) <img style=“inlinestyles here”>
